# Tables

```{r, results = 'asis'}

years = startyr:endyr
nfleets = 4
dead_all = NULL

for (i in 1:nfleets){
  name = paste0("retain(B):_",i)
  dead = model$timeseries[model$timeseries$Yr %in% years, name]
  dead_all = cbind(dead_all, dead)
}
total.dead  <- round(apply(dead_all, 1, sum), 1)
out = cbind(years, round(dead_all, 1), total.dead)
out = as.data.frame(out)
col_names = c("Year", "Fixed Gear", "Trawl", "Total Landings")

sa4ss::table_format(x = out,
             caption = "Landings (mt) by fleet and the summed coastwide total landigns (mt).",
             label = "landings",
             digits = 1,
             align = 'l',
             col_names = col_names)
```


```{r tab-data-strata}
sa4ss::table_format(
  x = strata |>
    dplyr::select(-name) |>
    dplyr::relocate(area, .after = dplyr::last_col()),
  caption = paste(
    "The stratification used to estimate design-based indices of abundance",
    "and to expand the survey composition data."
  ),
  longtable = FALSE,
  escape = FALSE,
  label = "data-strata",
  col_names_align = "l",
  align = "r",
  col_names = c(
    "Shallow Depth",
    "Deep Depth",
    "South\\ Latitude",
    "North\\ Latitude",
    "Area (km$^2$)"
  )
)
```
